00010 #include "history.h"
00011 #include "../Model/world_information.h"
00012 
00013 
00014 History::History(std::size_t size) : history_(size), consumer_position_(0), empty_count_(size), fill_count_(0){
00015 
00016 }
00017 
00018 void History::insert(boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> world_information) {
00019     empty_count_.wait();
00020     //TODO (dwonisch): Mutex is needed, since consumer_position_ is altered in both methods.
00021     //                 Maybe use a plain array instead of circular_buffer to avoid this.
00022     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00023     history_.push_front(world_information);
00024     ++consumer_position_;
00025     lock.unlock();
00026 
00027     fill_count_.post();
00028 }
00029 
00030 boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> History::get_oldest_unused(bool block) {
00031     if(block) {
00032         fill_count_.wait();
00033     }
00034     else if(!fill_count_.try_wait()) {
00035         return boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation>();
00036     }
00037 
00038     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex_);
00039     --consumer_position_;
00040     boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> result(new WorldInformation(*history_[consumer_position_]));
00041     lock.unlock();
00042 
00043     empty_count_.post();
00044     return result;
00045 }
00046 
00047 const WorldInformation& History::get_newest() const {
00048     return *history_.front();
00049 }
